Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-114, see notes following ยง 42-2851.01.

DC CODE ยง 42-2851.07

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An owner who fails to comply with a requirement of this chapter shall pay a civil fine of no greater than 5 times the costs and damages caused by the noncompliance.
All fines collected pursuant to this section shall be paid into the Housing Production Trust Fund established by Chapter 28 of this title.
The Mayor may commence enforcement proceedings for any fine not paid within the time period set forth in regulations.
